title: ue-scroll.js
subTitle: Lightweight JavaScript library for scroll up
step1: Have a try scroll down this page!
step2: Try to click or tap the button at the bottom right.

descriptionOf.element: Specify an element with a CSS selector.
descriptionOf.position: Specify the scroll position where the button is displayed.
descriptionOf.scrollSpeed: Specify the speed of scrolling (Recommend 20 or less)
descriptionOf.fadeSpeed: Specify the speed of fade (Recommend 20 or less)
descriptionOf.cancelByScroll:
Cancel scrolling when scroll down
(This setting is ignored on touch devices)
descriptionOf.cancelByKeydown: Cancel scrolling when pressed any key.

note.byTheDefault: By the default, ue-scroll.js automatically detect element having '#ue-scroll'. It needs to be started after DOM is rendered.
note.inAddition: In addition, You can freely change the color, design, position etc of buttons with CSS!
